p: It should be noted that when 7KC was used at 25 and 50 μM, two concentrations capable of inducing oxidative stress and favoring oxiapoptophagy [ 38, 80, 81], MTSO was able to attenuate the toxicity induced by 7KC (25–50 μM). As observed with α- and γ-tocopherol [ 47], docosahexahenoic acid [ 38], acid oleic [ 46] and dimethylfumarate [ 72], and argan oil [ 47], MTSO (0.1% v/ v) was able to counteract the inhibition of cell growth associated with 7KC-induced loss of cell adhesion.
